text:
@JoshuaPotash I will have NO EMPATHY when these dumbasses get #COVID19 

This is stupidity, plain and simple.

If these people choose to expose themselves to a virus that can possibly kill them, put them in a ventilator- more power to them.

I will #StayHome and choose NOT to get sick

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
